Name: Are You Afraid of the Dark
About the game: The lights went out again. But this time something is different. Feels like I am being watched. Use the Spray to make your way around the pitch-black house, find all the keys and get out before whatever is out there gets to you. Challenge yourself with 4 increasingly hard difficulties where you need to explore a pitch-black house using only your red 'Spray' to be able to see around. In order to find the keys listen to the audio cues and spray around to uncover them and collect them. Gather from 8 up to 30 depending on difficulty and escape by exiting the enclosing.
